column1: Uchi////Decided to finally come here for a special occasion
column2: and boy was it worth it! We did the 6 course tasting menu's - my bf did the regular one
column3: I did the vegetarian menu made vegan. The food was delicious to say the least! Each dish was delicately designed and incredibly flavorful. We both thoroughly enjoyed our meals and left with full bellies! I would definitely recommend making a reservation on the weekends
column4: you'll get one of the nice booths :)
